## Installation Instructions

### For New Users
1. Download the APK file from the assets below
2. On your Android device, go to Settings > Security > Install unknown apps
3. Enable installation from your browser or file manager
4. Tap the downloaded APK file to install
5. Follow the on-screen instructions

### For Existing Users
- The app will automatically check for updates when you open it
- If an update is available, you'll see a notification
- Tap "Download & Install" to update automatically
- Or download the APK manually from this release

## System Requirements
- **Android**: 5.0 (API level 21) or higher
- **Storage**: At least 100MB free space
- **Internet**: Required for AI features and updates

## Important Notes
- This is a beta release for testing purposes
- Your data is stored securely in the cloud
- The app requires internet connection for AI chat features
- All pregnancy data is encrypted and private

## Support
If you encounter any issues:
1. Check the troubleshooting section below
2. Report bugs via GitHub Issues
3. Contact support at [your-email@domain.com]

## Troubleshooting

### Installation Issues
- **"App not installed"**: Make sure you have enough storage space
- **"Unknown source blocked"**: Enable "Install unknown apps" in Android settings
- **"Package appears to be corrupt"**: Re-download the APK file

### App Issues
- **App crashes on startup**: Clear app data and restart
- **AI chat not working**: Check your internet connection
- **Data not syncing**: Ensure you're connected to the internet

### Update Issues
- **Update not showing**: Check your internet connection
- **Download fails**: Try downloading manually from this release
- **Installation fails**: Uninstall old version first, then install new one
